ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Data for RSF analysis of moose
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Data used to model the relative probability of occurrence of moose in winter as a function of landscape features (Table 1). Landscape features (various land cover types and variation of elevation within a 50-m radius buffer) are provided at observed GPS locations and at random locations.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Predator-prey interaction
Graph theory
Connectivity
Spatial game
